external_games.name: Trainz Simulator DLC: Nickel Plate High Speed Freight Set

name: Trainz Simulator 12: Nickel Plate High Speed Freight Set
summary: Relive the halcyon years of steam hauled freight services in the US with this stunningly modeled Trainz Simulator 12 add-on. This DLC pack includes the following: New York, Chicago & St. Louis / 'Nickel Plate Road' Class S-2 2-8-4 locomotive in early and late condition; Pere Marquette Class N-1 2-8-4 locomotive in 'as preserved' condition; NKP 40' Boxcar; and NKP 400 Series Bay Window Caboose.
